title: Conspiracy to restrain trade quote - effect

content.prompt:
“Every contract, combination in form of trust or
otherwise, or conspiracy, in restraint of trade or
commerce in any territory of the United States . . .
is hereby declared illegal.”


The passage above was most effectively used for
which purpose in the late nineteenth century?

choices.label: Restricting the power of monopolies and trusts
Upholding the powers of the Interstate Commerce Act

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
